StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruitersBySSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SSN char(9) ) AS SELECT P.PERSON_ID AS RECRUITING_PERSON_ID,
ISNULL(RP.RANK_CODE, '') AS RANK, P.LAST_NAME, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, P.SUFFIX_CD, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS RECRUITING_PERSON_SSN, RP.TOUR_BEGIN_DATE, RP.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID, RP.ORGANIZATION_ID, RP.[RowGuid] -- CASE -- WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NOT NULL -- THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME)) -- WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL -- THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) -- WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NULL -- THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) -- ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) -- END AS [DisplayName] FROM dbo.PERSON P WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON RP ON P.PERSON_ID = RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN
--- //select only recruiters whose TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL -- RP.TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL --ORDER BY -- [DisplayName] --
